data.text: @brijraj48547666 Mr Singh, we regret the inconvenience and believe that our Customer Care Team already assisted you with an Alternate Flight(s). Do let us know via DM in case you need more assistance and we look forward to having you onboard. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@reeshav_dey Mr Dey, we regret the inconvenience caused. The flight is delayed due to Operational Reasons and is expected to depart at 2215 hrs. You may get in touch with our Airport Team for any real-time assistance. Thanks. ~Navi
@GreatMusketeer Sir, we regret to note your disappointment. Could you please elaborate on your concern a bit more via DM along with the PNR so we may assist you? ~Kritika  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@SrideviChaturv2 We sincerely regret that you experienced a delay in retrieving your bag at arrivals. Our aim is to have the bags on the carousel within 15 mins of the flight landing. Please DM us your PNR so we may have your feedback shared. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@Jxpooja1 Sir, we regret to see this. While we work hard to keep our flight clean and insect-free, hope you'll understand insects cannot be completely guarded against and we can't fumigate when passengers are on board. we wish to provide you with a better experience in the future. ~Kritika

data.text: @VarunAg99958402 Mr Agarwal, you may visit https://t.co/AUxFsqaW7e to reschedule your flight with applicable charges. Do let us know via DM in case you need more assistance. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@ritikkkgupta Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Rescheduling can only be done up to 2 hours prior to the departure of the flight. Could you please share the PNR via DM so we may check and assist you? ~Kritika

@JellyIvy Ma'am, we see the amount is Auto Refunded and will reflect in your account within next 24 to 48 hrs. Do let us know via DM in case you need more assistance. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Food & Beverage Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent and related to foods & beverages such as snacks, soft drinks, beers.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

domain.name: Product Taxonomy
domain.description: A product taxonomy for labeling categories of products.
